translated: After that, from the multicolored [seat], one emanates wheels, lotuses, and vajras in the three corners of the hearth. This is called the first concentration with concepts.

original: de rnams kyi dbus su ral gri spro ba ni bsam gtan gnyis pa dpyod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbus su ral gri spro ba ni bsam gtan gnyis pa dpyod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The emission of the sword in the middle of those is called the second concentration, “investigation.”

original: mtshan ma bzhi'i lte ba rnams su /
analyzed: mtshan ma bzhi'i lte ba rnams su /
translated: In the centers of the four signs,

original: aom a'a:h'um ham zhes bya ba'i dga' ma rnams spro ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa dga' ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um ham zhes bya ba'i dga' ma rnams spro ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa dga' ba zhes bya'o //
translated: the emission of the four delights, “oṃ āḥ hūṃ haṃ,” is called the third concentration, “delight.”

original: de'i rjes la ral gri'i snying po'i lte bar dga' ma rnams bsdus pa las byung ba'i thig le phra mo mu tig gi rdog ma lta bur gang ba bsam pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa bde ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la ral gri'i snying po'i lte bar dga' ma rnams bsdus pa las byung ba'i thig le phra mo mu tig gi rdog ma lta bur gang ba bsam pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa bde ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: After that, the meditation on the pervasion of the subtle bindu that arises from the gathering of the four delights in the center of the heart of the sword is called the fourth concentration, “bliss.”

original: de'i rjes la mtshan ma bsdus pa las byung ba'i me nang du chud @241b pa'i sems kyi thig le bsam pa ni bsam gtan lnga pa sems rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la mtshan ma bsdus pa las byung ba'i me nang du chud @241b pa'i sems kyi thig le bsam pa ni bsam gtan lnga pa sems rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: After that, the meditation on the bindu of mind that arises from the gathering of the signs and is contained within the fire is called the fifth concentration, “one-pointed mind.”

original: 'di ni bsam gtan lnga pa zhes bya ba yan lag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan lnga pa zhes bya ba yan lag gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second part: “The Five Concentrations.”

original: de'i rjes la sna tshogs pa gdan dang bcas pa byung ste bde ba'i thig le dang sems kyi thig le nang du chud pa'i rin chen chen por bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yungs kar ltar phra ba bskyed la /🔽aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sna tshogs pa gdan dang bcas pa byung ste bde ba'i thig le dang sems kyi thig le nang du chud pa'i rin chen chen por bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yungs kar ltar phra ba bskyed la / aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: After that, the various seats arise, and the great jewel which contains the drop of bliss and the drop of mind is generated as the union of the subtle drop like a mustard seed.

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po //
translated: One should bless it with the mantra, Om, I am the nature of the realm of truth.

original: de nas gyen du drangs te sna'i rtse mor bzhag la bsgom pa 'di ni srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya ba yan lag gsum pa'o //🔽de nas snying gar zla ba la rang gi sngags bsams la de'i thig ler rin chen phra mo phab ste /
analyzed: de nas gyen du drangs te sna'i rtse mor bzhag la bsgom pa 'di ni srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya ba yan lag gsum pa'o // de nas snying gar zla ba la rang gi sngags bsams la de'i thig ler rin chen phra mo phab ste /
translated: Then, having drawn it up, one should place it at the tip of the nose and meditate. This is the third branch called life-force and exertion.🔽Then, having visualized one's mantra on the moon in the heart, one should cause the subtle jewel to descend into the drop there.

original: de nyid du nges pa bsgoms la de nas rang gi sngags la rab bsngags bstims te sku phra mo'i rin chen phra mo la brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid du nges pa bsgoms la de nas rang gi sngags la rab bsngags bstims te sku phra mo'i rin chen phra mo la brtag par bya'o //
translated: Having meditated on that certainty, one should then dissolve the mantra into it and imagine the subtle jewel of the subtle body.

original: de bzhin du a'a: bstims pas ni gsung gi phra mo la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du a'a: bstims pas ni gsung gi phra mo la'o //
translated: In the same way, by dissolving the A, one should imagine the subtle speech.

original: h'um bstims pas ni thugs kyi phra mo la'o //
analyzed: h'um bstims pas ni thugs kyi phra mo la'o //
translated: By dissolving the hūṃ, one enters into the subtle mind.

original: de'i rjes la rdo rje gsum po dbyer med pa'i rang gi sngags kyi gsang ba gsum po bsdus pa'i rin chen phra mo la gzud par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje gsum po dbyer med pa'i rang gi sngags kyi gsang ba gsum po bsdus pa'i rin chen phra mo la gzud par bya ste /
translated: After that, one should enter into the subtle jewel that is the collection of the three secrets of one’s mantra, which is the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: ji srid du de nyid du sems brtan par gyur gyi bar du gzung ba 'di ni 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yan lag bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid du de nyid du sems brtan par gyur gyi bar du gzung ba 'di ni 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yan lag bzhi pa ste /
translated: This is the fourth branch, called “retention.”

original: ji srid du tsa na ka'i 'bru tsam la brtan par ma gyur gyi bar du ni yan lag bzhi pa de nyid kyi sbyor ba bya la /
analyzed: ji srid du tsa na ka'i 'bru tsam la brtan par ma gyur gyi bar du ni yan lag bzhi pa de nyid kyi sbyor ba bya la /
translated: One should practice the yoga of the four branches until one becomes stable in that very [vajra] jewel, the size of a mustard seed.

original: brtan pa'i mtshan ma nye bar thob nas ni yan lag drug pa rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: brtan pa'i mtshan ma nye bar thob nas ni yan lag drug pa rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: When one obtains the sign of stability, one should complete the six branches.

original: ci ste brtan par gyur na sems kyi rin po che rdo rje nor bur phab la de las byung ba'i 'od kyi thig le padma'i nang du phyung ba las 'khor lo phra mor sprul te sku gnyis dang nam mkha'i ngos khyab pa'i 'khor lo phra mo spros pa
analyzed: ci ste brtan par gyur na sems kyi rin po che rdo rje nor bur phab la de las byung ba'i 'od kyi thig le padma'i nang du phyung ba las 'khor lo phra mor sprul te sku gnyis dang nam mkha'i ngos khyab pa'i 'khor lo phra mo spros pa
translated: If that is stable, then the precious mind is placed in the vajra gem, and from that, the light bindu is emitted into the lotus. From that, the subtle wheel is emanated, and the subtle wheel that pervades the space of the two bodies is emanated.

original: ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: That is the mindfulness of the Buddha.

original: de bzhin du padma spros pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du padma spros pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the emanation of the lotus is the mindfulness of the Dharma.

original: rdo rje spros pa ni rdo rje rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje spros pa ni rdo rje rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: The emanation of the vajra is the mindfulness of the vajra.

original: ral gri spros pa ni rigs rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: ral gri spros pa ni rigs rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: The emanation of the sword is the mindfulness of the family.

original: de nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yid kyis bkug ste bdag nyid la bcug nas rin po cher bsdus te /
analyzed: de nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yid kyis bkug ste bdag nyid la bcug nas rin po cher bsdus te /
translated: Then, having mentally summoned the uṣṇīṣa cakravartin, he is caused to enter oneself and is gathered into the gem.

original: rin po che de nyid las de'i 'khor lo spros pa ni /
analyzed: rin po che de nyid las de'i 'khor lo spros pa ni /
translated: From that gem, the emanation of the wheel is

original: khro bo rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: the mindfulness of the wrathful ones.

original: de nyid las 'od kyi thig le rnams las de nyid du mtshan ma lnga spros te /
analyzed: de nyid las 'od kyi thig le rnams las de nyid du mtshan ma lnga spros te /
translated: From that very gem, the five signs are emanated from the light bindus.

original: dbus su ni 'khor lo ser po'o //
analyzed: dbus su ni 'khor lo ser po'o //
translated: In the center, there is a yellow wheel.

original: lhag ma rnams ni ngos bzhi ru sprul la de rnams @242a * //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni ngos bzhi ru sprul la de rnams @242a * //
translated: The rest are emanated in the four directions.

original: spros pa ni dam tshig rjes su dran pa ste /
analyzed: spros pa ni dam tshig rjes su dran pa ste /
translated: Emanation is the recollection of the commitments.

original: 'di ni rjes su dran pa drug ces bya ba yan lag lnga pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rjes su dran pa drug ces bya ba yan lag lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifth branch called the six recollections.

original: de nas sems kyi rin po che snying ga'i sngags kyi thig ler drangs te gzhag la nam mkhar spros pa'i mtshan ma rnams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsdus te /
analyzed: de nas sems kyi rin po che snying ga'i sngags kyi thig ler drangs te gzhag la nam mkhar spros pa'i mtshan ma rnams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsdus te /
translated: Then, having drawn the jewel of the mind into the drop of mantra at the heart and placed it there, one should gather the signs emanated in space into a single mandala of light.

original: rin po che phra mo'i nang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdan gyi rnam pa ltar yun ring du bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i yan lag drug pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che phra mo'i nang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdan gyi rnam pa ltar yun ring du bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i yan lag drug pa'o //
translated: Like a small jewel within the form of the seat of a universal monarch, one should meditate for a long time. This is the sixth branch called meditative concentration.

original: ldang ba'i dus su ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di lngas smon lam gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: ldang ba'i dus su ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di lngas smon lam gdab par bya ste /
translated: At the time of rising, one should make aspirations with these five verses.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the body of all buddhas

original: phung po lnga yis rab tu gang //
analyzed: phung po lnga yis rab tu gang //
translated: is fully present in the five aggregates.

original: sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin pas //
translated: Since the nature of the buddha body

original: bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
analyzed: bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the speech of Vajradharma,

original: gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs //
translated: That speech is the perfect explanation.

original: bdag gi ngag kyang de 'dra bas //
analyzed: bdag gi ngag kyang de 'dra bas //
translated: May my speech also be like that,🔽And be equal to upholding the Dharma.

original: chos 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par shog / kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin //
analyzed: chos 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par shog / kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the mind of Samantabhadra,

original: gsang ba'i dbang po'i blo ldan pa ;
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang po'i blo ldan pa ;
translated: Endowed with the intellect of the lord of secrets,

original: / bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bas //
analyzed: / bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bas //
translated: May my mind also be like that,🔽And be equal to Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par shog / sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par shog / sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the mind of all sentient beings,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan //
translated: Marked by body, speech, and mind,

original: bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bas //
analyzed: bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bas //
translated: May my mind also be like that,🔽Endowed with the essence of space.

original: mkha' mtshungs snying po can gyur cig / rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin //
analyzed: mkha' mtshungs snying po can gyur cig / rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the vajra mantra body,

original: gsung gi sku ni rnam bsgoms te //
analyzed: gsung gi sku ni rnam bsgoms te //
translated: Meditating on the body of speech,

original: bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar //
analyzed: bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar //
translated: May I also always be like that,

original: sngags 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par shog / de ltar dngos grub mchog gi sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gis bsnyen pa dam tshig las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par shog / de ltar dngos grub mchog gi sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gis bsnyen pa dam tshig las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should not transgress the pledge of the approximation by means of the six-branched yoga of the supreme feat.

original: 'dir bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
translated: Here is a summary verse:

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig par bcas //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig par bcas //
translated: The cakravartin with the knowledge,

original: khang brtsegs nang du bltas nas su //
analyzed: khang brtsegs nang du bltas nas su //
translated: looking inside the mansion,

original: mkha' dang rdo rje gnas na tshogs //
analyzed: mkha' dang rdo rje gnas na tshogs //
translated: in the sky and the vajra-place,

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag drug rdzogs byed //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag drug rdzogs byed //
translated: completes the six-branched yoga.🔽The enjoyments of that hero,

original: sems dpa' de yi longs spyod dag / bsdus gnyis phra gsum rin po che //
analyzed: sems dpa' de yi longs spyod dag / bsdus gnyis phra gsum rin po che //
translated: the two collections, the three subtle [vajras], and the jewel,

original: rin chen bstan nas khyab par spro //
analyzed: rin chen bstan nas khyab par spro //
translated: having shown the jewel, emanate pervasively.

original: de nas rin po cher bsdu bya //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nas rin po cher bsdu bya // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Then, one should gather into the jewel.

original: bsnyen pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is the clear realization of the approximation.

original: 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor la gnas te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas sbyor ba'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor la gnas te /
translated: This is the yoga of the cakravartin, abiding in the yoga of the six-branched yoga.

original: bsnyen pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan pa de las yan lag drug pa ni 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yin la /
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan pa de las yan lag drug pa ni 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir gtso bo yin la /
translated: The six-branched yoga is the principal one because it is the result of the manifest realization of the approach.

original: @242b de ni rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: @242b de ni rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called the Vajra Array.

original: des na de'i le'u'i don gyi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: des na de'i le'u'i don gyi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, in order to open the chapter on its meaning, it says “then” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni gsang ba yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni gsang ba yin la /
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas are secret.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni 'dus pa yin te gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni 'dus pa yin te gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: Their vajra is the gathering, meaning the Gathering of Secrets.

original: / gsang ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du gsungs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: / gsang ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du gsungs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: Since it is taught just as it is, it is the tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni yang dag par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni yang dag par rtogs pa ste /
translated: “All tathāgatas” means the perfect realizations,

original: 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: such as the wheel, the lotus, the vajra, and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi sprin 'phro ba ni de rnams kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' khyab bar g-yogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sprin 'phro ba ni de rnams kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' khyab bar g-yogs pa'o //
translated: The spreading cloud of those is the cloud of those that covers the sky.

original: de'i bkod pa ni rdo rjer bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bkod pa ni rdo rjer bsdus pa'o //
translated: Its arrangement is included in the vajra.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the vajra, because it is indivisible.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The samadhi which has that as its object is called by that name.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni de ston pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni de ston pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “entered into evenness in that” is that he has made his mind one-pointed in the teaching of that.

original: rdo rje bkod pa ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje bkod pa ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid do //
translated: The vajra arrangement is that samadhi itself.

original: de ston par byed pa ni rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa ni rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste /
translated: The chapter of the vajra arrangement samadhi is that which teaches that.

original: 'dir so sor sdud pas grub pa'i sku ni gsang ba dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag gis grub pa'i gsung dang / thugs kyi phra mo rnams gong bur byas pas bskyed pa'i yungs kar phra mo'i sems kyi rin po che ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir so sor sdud pas grub pa'i sku ni gsang ba dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag gis grub pa'i gsung dang / thugs kyi phra mo rnams gong bur byas pas bskyed pa'i yungs kar phra mo'i sems kyi rin po che ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
translated: Here, the body accomplished by means of the withdrawal is the speech accomplished by means of the secret and the branch of meditation, and the subtle mind is the mustard seed generated by means of the collection of the subtle mind. The vajra is the life and exertion.

original: de snyed 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje zhes brjod de bye brag tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de snyed 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje zhes brjod de bye brag tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra is said to be the stabilization by means of the branch of retention of that much, because of the understanding of the distinction.

original: ji ltar bye brag tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bye brag tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it differentiated?

original: der rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because Vajrasattva enters it.

original: de yang ji skad du /
analyzed: de yang ji skad du /
translated: And that is stated:

original: 'dzin pas rtag tu stobs ldan te //
analyzed: 'dzin pas rtag tu stobs ldan te //
translated: Always powerful through retention,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug / ces gsungs so //
translated: Vajrasattva is truly entered.🔽The cloud of vajras, wheels, etc.

original: de nyid las rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sprin spros pa ni rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go //🔽de dag ni rdo rje de nyid du bsdus pa'i bkod pa ste de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de nyid las rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sprin spros pa ni rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go // de dag ni rdo rje de nyid du bsdus pa'i bkod pa ste de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag go //
translated: That very thing is the array of vajras, etc.

original: de bas na rdo rje bkod pa'i tshig gis yan lag drug po rdzogs par bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje bkod pa'i tshig gis yan lag drug po rdzogs par bstan pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the six branches are taught by the words “array of vajras.”

original: de thams cad kyi sngon du bya ba rnams kyang 'phangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de thams cad kyi sngon du bya ba rnams kyang 'phangs pa yin te /
translated: And all the preliminaries are implied.

original: de bas nang par langs nas lam la brten pa'i bar gyi cho ga nyams su blangs la sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon du byas te /
analyzed: de bas nang par langs nas lam la brten pa'i bar gyi cho ga nyams su blangs la sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon du byas te /
translated: Therefore, having arisen in the morning, one should practice the rite up to the path of reliance, and then manifest compassion for all sentient beings.

original: snang ba med pa'i byang chub kyi sems su @243a * //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'i byang chub kyi sems su @243a * //
translated: And one should generate the thought of awakening, which is free of appearances.

original: lhag par mos pa byas la sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: lhag par mos pa byas la sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: One should consecrate with the mantra, having generated devotion, and so on.

original: sngags de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /🔽aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngags de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa / aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mantra itself was spoken by the Blessed One.

original: rnam par shes pa ni sngags rnams kyi rgyu yin la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni sngags rnams kyi rgyu yin la /
translated: Om is the cause of the mantras,

original: de nyid ni rab sngags kyi don yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni rab sngags kyi don yin no //
translated: and that itself is the meaning of the mantra.

original: de bas na rab sngags ni sngags rnams kyi dang por gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rab sngags ni sngags rnams kyi dang por gyur pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mantra is the beginning of the mantras.

original: gnyis su 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma nub pas /
analyzed: gnyis su 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma nub pas /
translated: The sign of the cessation of duality,

original: chos thams cad gnyis kyis stong la /
analyzed: chos thams cad gnyis kyis stong la /
translated: all phenomena are empty of duality,

original: gcig tu mtha' yas shing nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bur snang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na'o //
analyzed: gcig tu mtha' yas shing nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bur snang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na'o //
translated: and the non-appearance of the infinite, like stainless space, is the śūnyatājñāna of the Buddhas.

original: de nyid ni badzra ste sgrib pa thams cad 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni badzra ste sgrib pa thams cad 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is vajra, because it pierces all obscurations.

original: de nyid ni sva bh'a ba ste sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sva bh'a ba ste sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: That itself is svabhāva, the generation of the mind.

original: de nyid a'atma ko& ham ste rang bzhin 'di la yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid a'atma ko& ham ste rang bzhin 'di la yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is the ĀTMAKO ’HAM, because it has this nature.

original: de nas ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: Then, what should one meditate on?

original: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: He declares, “in the sky,” etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The sky realm is the great seal of the source of phenomena.

original: des dbus ni de'i nang khang stong gi 'og logs na sna tshogs padma rgya che ba gyen du 'phags pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba gang yin pa de la gnas par bsgom pa ni'o //
analyzed: des dbus ni de'i nang khang stong gi 'og logs na sna tshogs padma rgya che ba gyen du 'phags pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba gang yin pa de la gnas par bsgom pa ni'o //
translated: In the middle of that, on the center of a great, upraised variegated lotus located on the lower surface of the empty interior of that, is the center of a variegated vajra. Meditate on it as being located there.

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor la sangs rgyas ni yi ge brum yongs su gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang ni dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor la sangs rgyas ni yi ge brum yongs su gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang ni dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: In the mandala of the buddhas, the buddhas are the celestial mansion that arises from the transformation of the syllable bhrūṃ, which is the mandala.

original: gang las 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po 'phro ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang las 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po 'phro ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: From which a great cloud of light rays emanates, that is what it is called.

original: sangs rgyas nyid 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid 'bar ba ste /
translated: The blazing of buddhahood

original: rnam par 'phro ba chen po gang yin pa dang / 'od de dang mnyam pa med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par 'phro ba chen po gang yin pa dang / 'od de dang mnyam pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the great radiating light, and that light is unequaled,

original: dpe med pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dpe med pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: that is, incomparable.

original: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab pa ni gang gis kun du ste /
analyzed: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab pa ni gang gis kun du ste /
translated: It is pervaded by the five lights, which means that

original: thams cad khyab cing dkrigs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad khyab cing dkrigs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: it is pervaded and filled with everything.

original: kun nas yongs su zlum po ste /
analyzed: kun nas yongs su zlum po ste /
translated: It is completely round.

original: zhes bya ba ni nang gi rim ba zlum por gnas pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nang gi rim ba zlum por gnas pa ste /
translated: The inner rim is round.

original: phyi rim ni zur bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi rim ni zur bzhi pa yin no //
translated: The outer rim is square.
